titles.title: E Prize Act of 2012
Excellence in Energy Efficiency Act of 2012
To provide a prize to the first manufacturer of highly-efficient mid-sized automobiles powered by gasoline.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

term.name: Hybrid, electric, and advanced technology vehicles

bill.summary: 2/1/2012--Introduced. Excellence in Energy Efficiency Act of 2012 or the E Prize Act of 2012 - Requires the Secretary of Energy (DOE) to establish a program to award a $1 billion prize to the first automobile manufacturer incorporated in the United States to manufacture and sell in the United States 60,000 mid-sized sedans that operate on gasoline and can travel 100 miles per gallon.
